oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Southern Review, June-July 1898
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: The Southern Review, An Illustrated Monthly Magazine. Knoxville, Tenn. Vol. III, No. 3 & 4. June - July 1898. Mid-Summer Number. Lieut. Richmond Hobson, the Hero of the Merrimac. Lieut. Richmond Hobson on cover. 10 cents, $1.00 a year.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Periodicals;
